TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Shandon_Anderson, title = Shandon_Anderson, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shandon_Anderson} }

S.FORM: Shandon Anderson sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1973, ryax sa tay 31 nqu tay 12, Shandon Anderson, squliq na p'unro.
